'ir^n:i!c Majesty .V G^vercHTit1013/'Vow Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,21th July .1919.(Repeated to Constantinople and Vladivoslock.)(Received 25th.)10018. 24th July. Malleson wires 23rd July :-." Transcaspia. Retreat of Transcaspian Army has ceasod. They have destroyed railway to within three versts of Bakhardenk at which place and (two corrupt groups) their force lies. Bolsheviks have not maintained touch, but are stated to have small advanced party at Geok Tepe. Heat is intense, 130 iu shade."2191
